email_verification_EMAIL_SAME: The email you entered is the same as your current email
email_verification_EMAIL_TOO_LONG: The email you entered is too long
email_verification_INVALID_EMAIL: The email you entered is invalid
email_verification_change_email_email_mi: Repeated email isn't the same as the new email
email_verification_change_email_password: This is not your current password
email_verification_change_email_subheadi: Want to keep your existing email?
email_verification_connection_error: There was an error contacting the server. Please try again in a minute
email_verification_email_sent_body: Sometimes this email can take a few minutes to reach your inbox. If after a few minutes you haven't received it, and it isn't in your spam folder, click the resend button below.
email_verification_email_sent_dont_recog: Don't recognize this email? Go back and
email_verification_permanent_error_descr: Unfortunately our system is currently unable to process requests. You may continue to game by clicking “Close” below. We will remind you to verify on next login, however you may also verify your email via account management at anytime.
email_verification_prompt_body: Your Riot Games account is valuable. Verifying your email will help us protect and recover your account should anything happen. Please click below to send a verification email to the address provided.
email_verification_prompt_body_heading: Why do you need to do this?
email_verification_quit: Click here to exit League of Legends
email_verification_rate_limited_error: We detected too many requests from your computer in a short period of time. Please wait a couple of minutes and retry.
email_verification_will_become_mandatory: Having a verified email will become mandatory
Having a verified email will become mandatory shortly
